title: Launch issues with razer products
body:
When i open the patcher everything works fine but when i click launch the patcher closes as usual but then the login screen doesn't open. I then have to end the lolclient process in the task manager and try again. I was trying to find a fix and found that people had had similar problems with razer products so i tried again after closing synapse and changing my keyboard and mouse and it worked fine. Does anyone have a solution so i don't have to change keyboard and mouse every time i play league?
Thanks!

replies.body: I haven't heard of issues with razer products, and the I can't imagine any settings that would cause the issue you're having.  Your specific issue sounds like a setting with your OS or security feature that's blocking the client from launching.  Your best bet would be to go over each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.
